Defines

#define nvm_write_reg(reg, value)   mmio_write8((void *) (NVM_CONTROLLER_BASE + NVM_##reg), value)
 Write value to the 8-bit NVM register reg.
#define nvm_read_reg(reg)   mmio_read8((void *)(NVM_CONTROLLER_BASE + NVM_##reg))
 Read the 8-bit NVM register reg.
